games.title: TB World
games.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
games.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

games.title: Hidden Objects: Home Sweet Home
games.description:

üßñ Search items and find hidden objects by developing attentiveness and observation. Searching for objects is a leisurely relaxation with pleasant music that is interesting to everyone - this game for girls, for children and adults, for girls and boys, women and men.

games.title: Hedgies
games.description: A single Hedgehog is capable of turning a desolate and abandoned household on plot of land into a bustling and flourishing farm. Only a few of us, people, are aware of the fact that Hedgies are great cooks, fishermen, craftsmen and last, but not the least, fabulously hospitable types! Come and see for yourself, plunge into ‚ÄòHedgies‚Äô game and contribute to the beautification of the Valley.
games.howToPlayText: Hedgies is a charming farming game where a hardworking hedgehog transforms an abandoned plot into a thriving homestead. Grow crops, craft goods, and master skills like cooking and fishing. With a warm and welcoming spirit, your hedgehog will turn the valley into a lively community. Step in and help bring this enchanting world to life!

games.title: Pow
games.description: Have you ever taken care your pet!? Feed it, clean it, play with it and watch it grow up while leveling up? This is all possible is this brand new Pow game for web and mobile. Feed, nurture and take care of your Pow. Play different games in games room and collect coins to buy food to feed your pow and buy decoration to customize your room! Also challenge your friends in 3 fun minigames!
games.howToPlayText:
Use the mouse or touch the screen to interact with Pow and the objects. Follow the instructions on the screen.
You can see the needs progression of the Pow in the vertical bars at the top of the screen for each room. Try to keep the bars full attending the needs in each room.

games.title: Ninja dash: Cozy tactic puzzle
games.description: Dive into the exciting realm of Ninja Dash: Cozy Tactic Puzzle, a free online game where stealth and strategy unite. As a ninja tactician, eliminate foes with careful planning, using your surroundings to perfect each move, whether on your phone or computer.
games.howToPlayText:
Keyboard 
Rotate player - hold RMB + move mouse 
Action - LMB
Camera rotate & zoom - AD, mouse wheel
Mobile 
Player - screen buttons
Camera rotate & zoom - swipe left/right, pinch

games.title: Emily''s Hotel Solitaire
games.description: Emily''s Hotel Solitaire is a thrilling card game where you can design your ideal hotel. Play for free online and enjoy a tropical escape while helping Emily realize her grandfather''s dream. Earn stars to enhance your environment, transforming it into a stunning destination with each achievement.
games.howToPlayText:
Select the cards that are one higher or one lower in value of your drawn
card to remove it from the playing field. To complete a level, you need to remove all the cards from
the playing field without running out of cards from your stock.

games.title: Fix The Hoof
games.description: Dive into the calming experience of Fix The Hoof, a free online game where you care for the hooves of different animals like horses and goats. Enjoy a captivating 3D environment while earning money to improve your farm. Accessible on both mobile and desktop, it's perfect for relaxation.
games.howToPlayText: Who doesn't like the ASMR feel in cleaning and fixing hoof of a horse, cow, goat etc. This is the most satisfying ASMR 3d game for cleaning, polishing and painting hooves. You've seen it in the ASMR videos and now you get to do it yourself in this oddly satisfying game!

games.title: CLUTTER MASTER
games.description:
Clutter Master is a casual cozy game where you organize a messy room by placing each item where it belongs.
A secret awaits at the end of the game...
games.howToPlayText:
Organize the messy room by placing each item where it belongs.
Click on an object to grab it, then drag and drop it into the correct spot. Click again to release it.
Once everything is organized, you‚Äôll automatically move on to the next level with a brand new room to tidy!
